targets.expr: sum by(method, uri)(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{job="user_service_prometheus", uri!="/**", uri!="/actuator", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}) / sum by(method, uri)(http_server_requests_seconds_count{job="user_service_prometheus", uri!="/**", uri!="/actuator", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"})
